name: meadowwalking
description:
meadowwalking is an experimental non-colonial "block game" in the vein of Minecraft. It's about walking around and enjoying nature.

It's unfinished right now, and this version is even shy of the "demo" I was planning on releasing.

I'm putting it up here because it's been stagnating on my hard drive for a long time, and I honestly had way too many ideas for it and a lack of a clear vision. Maybe I'll come back to it someday!

### Controls: ###

  • Mouse to look around
  • WASD / Arrows to move
  • "C" to take a screenshot
  • "P" to toggle pixel filter
  • "B" to open debug info
  • With debug info open:
    • "(" and ")" to increase / decrease view distance
  • With pixel filter off:
    • "H" to toggle dyslexia-friendly font
    • "K" and "L" to increase / decrease font size
